byline.original: By RAYMOND DANIELL Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: ed on Viscount Halifax s on Allied war reasons
snippet: LONDON, March 2--There is something ironical about the arrival of Sumner Welles, Under-Secretary of State, at this particular moment in what is regarded willy-nilly as a mission of peace-making....

headline.main: SPRING IS IN THE AIR IN BRITAIN, BUT NOT PEACE; One Side or Other Must Be Whipped, And Whipped Decisively, Is the View

lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 2--There is something ironical about the arrival of Sumner Welles, Under-Secretary of State, at this particular moment in what is regarded willy-nilly as a mission of peace-making.
